name: Graviocoin
public_notice: GIO has been transferred onto POS-technology with the ratio of 100:1 from 2nd December 2020. More details can be found on https://graviex.net/documents/gio_swap

description.en:
GRAVIO Ecosystem is a new communication platform (c2b, b2b, c2c). It is able to unite people, smart things and business, allow all participants (both virtual and real) to communicate using natural language and it will help to work and earn money..

GRAVIO will able to create Unified secure communication space, unified protected information field / space, unified semantic space, unified geoinformation space and unified space for earning and spending based on the crypto currency - GRAVIO coin (GIO)
